entries.name: SEARCH_INDEX_FILE
entries.desc: Where the search index lives in the generated output

entries.name: new(parent_generator, options)
entries.desc: Creates a new generator.  parent_generator is used to determine the #class_dir and #file_dir of links in the output index.

entries.name: build_index()
entries.desc: Builds the JSON index as a Hash.

entries.name: class_dir()
entries.desc: The directory classes are written to

entries.name: debug_msg(*msg)
entries.desc: Output progress information if debugging is enabled

entries.name: file_dir()
entries.desc: The directory files are written to

entries.name: generate()
entries.desc: Writes the JSON index to disk

entries.name: generate_gzipped()
entries.desc: Compress the search_index.js file using gzip

entries.name: index_classes()
entries.desc: Adds classes and modules to the index
